word: UNII devices
The device for operation in the band 5150-5250 MHz is only for indoor use
to reduce the potential for harmful interference to co-channel mobile
satellite systems: For devices with detachable antenna(s) , the maximum
antenna gain permitted for devices in the band 5725-5850 MHz shall be
such that the equipment still complies with the eirp. limits as appropriate.
Where applicable, antenna type(s) , antenna models(s) , and worst-case tilt
angle(s) necessary to remain compliant with the e.i.rp. elevation mask
requirement set forth in section 6.2.2.3 shall be clearly indicated.
